column3: Latest;Battambang: Police say two suspects on motorbike
column4: killed one young man and left another injured a on the night of January 29 in the Sangke area of Battambang town.------A senior criminal bureau official said the act was committed by two unidentified gangsters.Â They were riding on a motorbike
column5: chasing the victims who were also on a motorbike.------ According to the preliminary investigation
column6: the two victims were Lon Keo
column7: a 17-year-old male who suffered severe left head injuries but died when taken to the provincial hospital and a 16-year-old Phan Pheakdey
column8: who needed 5 stitches.------A large knife/sword is believed to have been used in the attack. Police are now hunting the suspects. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
